sys_ui_message.message:
Your leave balance can be found as follows: 1. On Workday, click on the cloud icon or your profile and select **view profile** from the dropdown 2. Underneath your name and surname on the left of your screen, click on **Time off** 3. Select **Time off balance** 4. Click on **View Time Off balance** 5. All types of leave will appear. **Ending Period balance** is your leave balance.
Your accumulated leave may be encashed or used as holiday leave instead of annual leave. Please note that we can only encash up to 12 days of accumulated leave per year.
